name: Kiowo Alchemy Complete
description:
The evil Kiowos, wants to kill the king, defend him! Create new Kiowos by combining the flowers left by the enemy. The power of the new Kiowo depends on the selected flowers. Pink flowers gives life, red flowers create explosions, blue flowers gives speed buff/debuffs and yellow flowers makes the attacks ricochet on new targets. If a Kiowo has more the pink flowers than any other flowers, it became a green healer Kiowo!

Gameplay: 

This is my game for the Epic Unreal Engine 4 Spring 2018 Jam, I didn't complete the game in time but I kept working on it and this is the final version.

Have fun! 

You can find me here on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GranokGab

You can read more on my blog: http://www.gabgra.com/content/games/KiowoAlchemy.php
